A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've never been so board During a star wars movie. I wouldn't say it's as bad as Clone Wars\, but I'd put it at Phantom Menace level of awfulness. There are some cool part/scenes but most of the movie is running around (and not in the good way like rogue one) with some really weird \"choices\". There were multiple times when I laughed out loud during serious parts. Especially when characters fly through space. Also they throw away some of the most interesting/mysterious characters from the first movie and we learn nothing about them. It feels like this movie and plot should have been an animated\, straight to DVD movie. I hope that when the hype dies down people will start realising that this movie is bad. (similar to what happened with EP1)
